issue.title: [C++][Compute] Improve performance of the hash table used in GroupIdentifier
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12010](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12010). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11591 adds support for grouped aggregation with a very basic hash table.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12010?focusedCommentId=17347980) by Michal Nowakiewicz (michalno):*
Support for big endian architecture is missing and has been moved to a separate task: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12830

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12010?focusedCommentId=17348814) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9768
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9768>
